alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Mercer; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 9:34PM EST until December 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Sleet may also mix in for a brief period. Total ice accumulations between one tenth and one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and western Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Mercer; Venango
